overview: Seraglio is a 2000 English language comedy/romance film written and directed by Colin Campbell and Gail Lerner, and starring Debra Christofferson, Joseph Grimm, Dean Nolen, and Gary Kelley. In the film, a bored housewife named Georgia discovers a love note in her garden with the mysterious word "seraglio." The film was nominated for an Oscar for Best Live Action Short Film.
title: Seraglio
